item.title: Intro
item.description: RStudio: File > New File > RMarkdown … > Select output PDF and OK. See rmd2pdf_01_01.Rmd sequenceDiagram participant Rmd participant pdf Rmd-pdf: knit button Rmd-pdf: = `rmarkdown::pdf_document()` rmarkdown: render()/pdf_document() Under the hood, the rendering of a document is managed by R, but also involves Pandoc. The rmarkdown’s functions render() and pdf_document() are high level functions which can manages most of the features a user my need when generating a document.
